name: End to End Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Add one letter to the word END to make a word meaning to repair.
questions.explanation:
Mend.

	M + END = MENDHe had to MEND the puncture in his bicycle tyre.

questions.text: Add one letter to the word END to make a word meaning to direct a message or person.
questions.explanation:
Send.

	S+ END = SENDMy parents often SEND me to bed early.

questions.text: Add two letters to the word END to make a word meaning the current style or fashion.
questions.explanation:
Trend.

	TR + END = TRENDAll of my friends follow the latest fashion TREND.

questions.text: Add two letters to the word END to make a word meaning the act of combining or mixing.
questions.explanation:
Blend.

	BL + END = BLENDFirst, we need to BLEND the ingredients of the cake.

questions.text: Add three letters to the word END to make a word meaning a person or acquaintance you know, like and trust.
questions.explanation:
Friend.

	FRI + END = FRIENDSandy is my best FRIEND.

questions.text:
Add three letters to the word END to make a word meaning to protect from attack or danger.
Starts with the letter - D.
questions.explanation:
Defend.

	DEF + END = DEFENDThe soldiers had to DEFEND their headquarters from attack by the enemy.

questions.text:
Add four letters to the word END to make a word meaning to give a false impression, or to bluff.
Starts with the letter - P.
questions.explanation:
Pretend.

	PRET + END = PRETENDIt is wrong to PRETEND that you are unwell.

questions.text:
Add three letters to the word END to make a word meaning to cause displeasure or anger.
Starts with the letter - O.
questions.explanation:
Offend.

	OFF + END = OFFENDRude words will often OFFEND people.

questions.text:
Add four letters to the word END to make a word meaning to interrupt or defer for a period of time.
Starts with the letter - S.
questions.explanation:
Suspend.

	SUSP + END = SUSPENDThe referee decided to SUSPEND the game because of the bad weather.

questions.text: Add seven letters to the word END to make a word meaning a close female companion or sweetheart.
questions.explanation:
Girlfriend.

	GIRLFRI + END = GIRLFRIENDI often go to the movies with my GIRLFRIEND Kerry.Thanks for playing.
